StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetAc.vityObjec.ve]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Recrui.ngOrgID int, @FiscalYear int, @Month int, @OrgType varchar(7) AS
DECLARE @MissionValue int
IF @OrgType = 'RS' BEGIN SET @MissionValue = (SELECT SUM(MISSION_VALUE) FROM [dbo].[CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN] CMP WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [dbo].[RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION] RO ON CMP.ORGANIZATION_ID = RO.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP OM ON CMP.ORGANIZATION_ID = OM.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE OM.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = @Recrui.ngOrgID AND CMP.CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE = 'RS' AND CMP.FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND CMP.MONTH_CODE = @Month AND RO.ORGANIZATION_TYPE = 'RSS') END
IF @OrgType = 'RSS' Or @OrgType = 'NEW RSS' BEGIN SET @MissionValue = (SELECT MISSION_VALUE FROM [dbo].[CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN] CMP WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [dbo].[RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION] RO ON CMP.ORGANIZATION_ID = RO.ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE CMP.ORGANIZATION_ID = @Recrui.ngOrgID AND CMP.FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND CMP.MONTH_CODE = @Month AND CMP.CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE = 'RS' AND RO.ORGANIZATION_TYPE = 'RSS') END
IF @MissionValue IS NULL SET @MissionValue = 0
SELECT AO.ORGANIZATION_ID AS Recrui.ngOrgID, AO.FISCAL_YEAR AS FiscalYear, AO.MONTH AS MonthCode, @MissionValue AS CONTRACT_OBJECTIVE, AO.NWAS_OBJECTIVE, AO.INTERVIEWS_OBJECTIVE, AO.TCS_OBJECTIVE, AO.OTS_OBJECTIVE, AO.ACS_OBJECTIVE, AO.HVS_OBJECTIVE, AO.DCS_OBJECTIVE, AO.WORK_DAYS, AO.CONTRACT_OBJECTIVE AS AO_CONTRACT_OBJECTIVE FROM [dbo].[ACTIVITY_OBJECTIVE] AO WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AO.ORGANIZATION_ID = @Recrui.ngOrgID AND AO.FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND AO.MONTH = @Month
